description: Array T read by rows: T(i,0)=1 for i >= 0; T(i,i)=0 for i >= 1; T(i,j)=Sum{T(i-2k,j-2k+1): k >= 1} for 1<=j<=i-1, where T(m,n) := 0 if m<0 or n<0.
comments: T(i+j,j)=number of strings (s(1),...,s(m)) of nonnegative integers s(k) such that m<=i+1, s(m)=j and s(k)-s(k-1) is an odd positive integer for k=2,3,...,m.T(i+j,j)=number of compositions of j consisting of at most i parts, all positive odd integers.
formula: G.f. for k-th diagonal: (1-x^2-x*(x/(1-x^2))^k)/(1-x-x^2). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Mar 10 2005
author: _Clark Kimberling_, May 28 2000
